prathamika pasal sanwardhanaya kirime wadasatahana yatathe alawwe pahala bujjomuwa prathamika widuhale siyalu godanangili alawwa wiwidhasewa samupakara samithiya magin pilisakara kara atha.1956 di aarambha karana lada me widuhala wasiyamata onna menna kiya thibiyadi wathman widuhalpathi ti.ee. lesli gunawardhana mahathage uthsahaya matha nawatha widuhala sanwardhitha thaththwayata pathwa atha.ehi pilisakara karana lada godanangili baradime uthsawayak pasugiyada ema widuhaledi pawathwini.ema awasthawata pamini alawwa wiwidhasewa samupakara samithiye sabhapathi sumith pathirana mahatha kiwe samupakaraya yanu labha labana aayathanayak pamanak nowana bawath gamin aarambha wu samupakaraya gamata sewaya kirimata badi sitina bawathya.alawwa pradeshiya sabha manthri sumith priyantha, widuhalpathi ti.ee. lesli gunawardhana am. aar. samel pranandu yana mahathwaru da katha kalaha..
